register.title: Create enterprise account
register.subtitle: Join MentalFit for your team's well-being

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: We'll send you a reset link

success.title: Email sent
success.message: Check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
success.note: If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password
resetPassword.invalidToken: The reset link is invalid or has expired

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email
verifyEmail.message: We've sent a verification link to your email address.
verifyEmail.instructions: Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.

setup.title: Set up two-factor authentication
setup.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to your account

step1.title: Scan the QR code
step1.description: Use an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy to scan this QR code.

step2.title: Enter the verification code
step2.description: Enter the 6-digit code that appears in your authenticator app.

verify.title: Two-factor verification
verify.subtitle: Enter the code from your authenticator app

disable.title: Disable two-factor authentication
disable.confirm: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication?
disable.warning: This will make your account less secure.

sessionExpired.title: Session expired
sessionExpired.message: Your session has expired due to inactivity. Please sign in again.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.passwordNoLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.passwordNoNumber: Password must contain at least one number
errors.passwordNoSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Please try again later
errors.networkError: Connection error. Please check your internet

hero.title: Your Mental Wellbeing
hero.subtitle: Connect with certified psychologists, access wellness resources, and care for your mental health in a safe and confidential environment. Because your wellbeing matters.

features.title: Why Choose MentalFit?
features.subtitle: Our comprehensive platform combines cutting-edge technology with human expertise to deliver exceptional mental health support for your organization.

hipaa.title: HIPAA Compliant
hipaa.description: Enterprise-grade security and privacy protection for all sessions and data.

professionals.title: Licensed Professionals
professionals.description: Access to verified, licensed therapists and mental health specialists.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock crisis support and emergency mental health resources.

evidence.title: Evidence-Based
evidence.description: Proven therapeutic approaches backed by research and clinical evidence.

benefits.title: Transform Your Workplace Culture
benefits.subtitle: Investing in employee mental health isn't just the right thing to do—it's smart business. See the measurable impact on your organization.

list.burnout: Reduce employee burnout by up to 40%

card.title: Ready to Get Started?
card.subtitle: Join hundreds of companies already transforming their workplace culture.

footer.tagline: Empowering workplaces with professional mental health support.

hero.title: About MentalFit
hero.subtitle: Leaders in corporate mental health solutions

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To transform organizational well-being through accessible, professional, and effective mental health solutions that empower teams and companies to thrive.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every organization prioritizes employee mental health, creating healthier, more productive, and more human work environments.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make mental health care accessible to everyone

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: We only work with licensed, high-quality therapists

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your information is protected with the highest standards

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly improve our technology and services

story.title: Our Story
story.content: MentalFit was born from the vision of creating a healthier work world. Founded by mental health and technology professionals, our platform combines the best of both worlds to offer innovative and effective solutions.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We have a diverse team of psychologists, therapists, developers, and wellness specialists dedicated to your success.

hero.title: Plans & Pricing
hero.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your organization

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Ideal for small businesses getting started

trial.question: Do you offer a trial period?
trial.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day free trial for all our plans. No credit card required.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time without penalty. You only pay for the time you use.

implementation.question: How long does it take to implement MentalFit?
implementation.answer: Most organizations are up and running in 1-2 weeks. Enterprise plans may take longer depending on customizations.

privacy.question: How do you protect employee privacy?
privacy.answer: We comply with HIPAA and all sessions are completely confidential. Employers only see aggregated, anonymous metrics.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of companies transforming their workplace culture

generalSupport.title: General Support
generalSupport.description: Questions about our services or platform

hero.title: Request a Demo
hero.subtitle: Discover how MentalFit can transform your organization

form.title: Schedule Your Personalized Demo
form.message: What would you like to know?
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your specific needs...
form.consent: I agree to receive communications from MentalFit

customization.title: Customization Options
customization.description: Discover how to adapt MentalFit to your needs

pricing.title: Plans & Pricing
pricing.description: Find the perfect solution for your budget

qa.title: Q&A Session
qa.description: Get all your questions answered by our experts

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using MentalFit, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: MentalFit provides an enterprise mental health platform that connects employees with licensed mental health professionals.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

privacy.title: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: We comply with HIPAA and all applicable data protection laws. See our Privacy Policy for more information.

professionalServices.title: 5. Professional Services
professionalServices.content: All therapists on our platform are licensed and certified. Services do not substitute for emergency medical care.

payment.title: 6. Payment and Billing
payment.content: Prices are subject to change with prior notice. Subscriptions renew automatically until cancelled.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: You can cancel your account at any time. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: MentalFit is not responsible for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of significant changes.

governing.title: 10. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the country where MentalFit operates.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At MentalFit, the privacy of your data is our top priority. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as name, email, company information, and data related to therapy sessions.

dataUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use your information to provide services, improve our platform, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

hipaaCompliance.title: 4. HIPAA Compliance
hipaaCompliance.content: We fully comply with HIPAA. All protected health information (PHI) is handled with the highest security and confidentiality standards.

dataSharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties except when necessary to provide services or when required by law.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement robust technical, administrative, and physical security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.

userRights.title: 7. Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal data. Contact privacy@mentalfit.com to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and personalize content.

dataRetention.title: 9. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described or as required by law.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes through the platform or by email.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, contact privacy@mentalfit.com
